workExperience.description: At Ebony Books, I had the privilege of working as a lead writer for a period of 1 year and 4 months. My role involved creating original content for a range of publishing projects, including fiction novels, non-fiction books, and scripts. I worked closely with editors and designers to ensure consistency and quality in the final product. Additionally, I had the opportunity to participate in creative brainstorming sessions and research to develop new ideas for future releases. It was a rewarding experience that allowed me to expand my creativity and narrative skills.

At Quill & Parchment, I've been working as a freelance writer since September 2019. I collaborate closely with authors and editors to provide creative writing, editing, and consulting services. My work involves crafting synopses, sample chapters, and reviews for a variety of literary genres, including contemporary fiction, science fiction, and mystery. Additionally, I've had the opportunity to represent the agency at literary events and conferences, where I've established valuable connections with other industry professionals.

During my time at Golden Pages, I worked as a contributing writer for the leading literary magazine in the industry. I contributed a variety of articles, book reviews, and author interviews. Additionally, I had the opportunity to participate in editorial planning and content selection for each issue. This experience allowed me to expand my network within the literary world and enhance my writing skills in different formats. It was an honor to be part of such a talented and passionate team.
